name: AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest
desc: An object that encapsulates information about a resource request from a resource loader object.

items.name: var request: URLRequest
items.desc: The URL request object for the resource.

items.name: var requestor: AVAssetResourceLoadingRequestor
items.desc: The asset resource requestor that made the request.

items.name: var contentInformationRequest: AVAssetResourceLoadingContentInformationRequest?
items.desc: The information for a requested resource.

items.name: var dataRequest: AVAssetResourceLoadingDataRequest?
items.desc: The range of requested resource data.

items.name: var redirect: URLRequest?
items.desc: An URL request instance if the loading request was redirected.

items.name: var response: URLResponse?
items.desc: The URL response for the loading request.

items.name: func finishLoading()
items.desc: Causes the receiver to treat the processing of the request as complete.

items.name: var isCancelled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request has been cancelled.

items.name: func finishLoading(with: Error?)
items.desc: Causes the receiver to handle the failure to load a resource for which a resource loaderâ€™s delegate took responsibility.

items.name: var isFinished: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether loading of the resource has finished.
